content: विसंवद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To be inconsistent, be at variance; कमलानां मनोहराणामपि रूपाद्विसंवदति शीलं <ls>Mu. 1. 19</ls>; शकटदासस्तु मित्रमिति विसंवदंत्यक्षराणि <ls>Mu. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To break one's word or promise. {@--3@} To disappoint, deceive. {@--4@} To fail. {@--5@} To assert falsely. {@--6@} To contradict. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To make inconsistent. {@--2@} To disappoint, to cause to fail; रमणीयोऽवधिर्विधिना विसंवादितः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To fail to prove.
